attributes.action: Put all school back a year
attributes.additional_details: Our children’s futures are important more then ever because of the COVID some children will have missed most of the academic year a year if education they will never get bk I petition the government to change this
attributes.background:
I call on all mps to vote so no children’s future suffers  
Children from poorer back grounds will be worst hit by COVID allow every child an extra year in school

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
